dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: I’m here to split things apart. Be it people, flowing water, drifting clouds, or a beating heart.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: My day starts at night~ In other words… Don’t wake me up at this hour.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: ‘Sup, Dante! What’d you have for lunch? Better not’ve had a better meal than mine.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Earned a hefty sum of protection fees today~ Now where will I spend this? Heehee.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: My sword is terribly sharp. Pretty darn rash, too. I’m saying it miiiight just fail to hear your orders once in a blue moon. Not me, my sword. Fuhu.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Heyo~ That kid just won’t stop pestering me, y’know? Says I’m being too vicious with the way I fight or whatevs… It’s not my fault my foes are too soft for my sharp sword. Whew, what a nuisance.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Just letting you know~ I’ll be leaving this place whenever I get bored. Don’t you even think about stopping me~

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: I like the Backstreets~ It’s the right level of grimy—a perfectly humble backdrop for letting my swank swordry shine.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Way too many stingy folks in the world. Keeping all that money in a vault is going against the whole point of currency. …So let’s help that stockpiled cash find its true purpose.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Mmm~ Keepin’ me waiting is gonna be a tad bit pricey. Think you can pay out?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Ain’t gonna make a wick of difference doing a street dweller like me extra favors. It’s not like I’m here to stay… But still, I guess it’s nice to get something.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Time to pay up~

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: So, Dante, who do I cut down this time?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: My, I don’t like to be bothered when I’m working~

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I like some substance in my victims~

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: You’re not too soft, huh?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hngh…

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Turned out mushy.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Yeesh. Don’t try to convince anyone that you’re a tough one~

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Never failed this kind of job!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Nyeh~ This one’s a flub.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: That was a pretty crude job. Don’t you have something more fun?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: See, there’s nothing I can’t cut.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Things just don’t work out sometimes~ It’s not my sword’s fault.
